mapper.insert: insert into bandJoinRequest(bandNo, memberId, joinStatus) values (#{bandNo}, #{memberId}, 'pending')
mapper.select: select joinStatus from bandJoinRequest where bandNo = #{bandNo} and memberId = #{memberId} order by joinAt desc limit 1

select br.idx, br.bandNo, br.memberId, br.joinStatus, br.joinAt, m.nickname as memberNicname from bandJoinRequest br inner join member m on br.memberId = m.id where br.bandNo = #{bandNo} and br.joinStatus = 'pending' order by br.join At asc
mapper.update: update bandJoinRequest set joinStatus = #{joinStatus} where idx = #{idx} and bandNo = #{bandNo} and joinStatus = 'pending'
update band set memberCnt = memberCnt + 1 where no = #{bandNo}
